ai-anya-e1001n6:2_0: will not neglect a great man,
ai-anya-e1001n6:3_0: Those who are lost in things, and are lost,
ai-anya-e1001n6:5_0: If a bull while crossing (a stream) goes on a straight course,
ai-anya-e1001n6:6_0: All the other cows (also) go straight, being led by one who goes straight.
ai-anya-e1001n6:8_0: * Just so with men, if (the King) who is agreed upon as the best,
ai-anya-e1001n6:9_0: if he is honest, what to say of the other people?
ai-anya-e1001n6:10_0: If a bull while crossing (a stream) goes on a straight course,
ai-anya-e1001n6:11_0: All the other cows (also) go straight, being led by one who goes straight.
ai-anya-e1001n6:12_0: * Just so with men, if (the King) who is agreed upon as the best,
ai-anya-e1001n6:13_0: if he is honest, what to say of the other people?
ai-anya-e1001n6:14_0: The whole country is happy, if the King is in accordance with Dhamma.
ai-anya-e1001n6:16_0: I had a lot of (all) appearance,
ai-anya-e1001n6:17_0: they will enter (them) harass, and pregnant women.
ai-anya-e1001n6:19_0: you should be guarded, separated from family to family.
ai-anya-e1001n6:20_0: for the son of good family circled his son,
